alert.note: Alert for Northern Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 3:48AM CST until January 15 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 degrees. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 degrees. * WHERE...Starr and Northern Hidalgo Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 1 PM CST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures fall through the morning with winds chills dropping below 30 by or shortly after 7 AM.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
